usa: The Fordney–McCumber Tariff was signed into law.<sup id="cite_ref-93" class="reference">[93]</sup>
australia: The Smith Family charity is founded in Sydney
Australian federal election, 1922: Billy Hughes reelected as Prime Minister.
albania: Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople Patriarch Meletius IV of Constantinople recognized the Orthodox Autocephalous Church of Albania.
afgan: Solar Hijri calendar officially adopted in Afghanistan.<sup id="cite_ref-1" class="reference">[1]</sup>
